ResearchProjectDef.label: pemmican
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make pemmican, a preserved mixture of meat and plant matter that doesn't go bad for a long time. Great for traveling.

ResearchProjectDef.label: passive cooler
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make passive coolers, a way to cool indoor spaces without using electricity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: devilstrand
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to plant devilstrand, a slow-growing mushroom that yields a valuable plant fiber.

ResearchProjectDef.label: brewing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build a brewery to transform hops into tasty, tasty beer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: carpet making
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build carpets to increase the quality of their environments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: smithing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build smithies for crafting metal weapons and tools.

ResearchProjectDef.label: stonecutting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build stonecutting tables, which allow you to refine rock chunks into stone blocks that can be used for construction.

ResearchProjectDef.label: complex clothing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Sew complicated garments like pants, dusters, and cowboy hats.

ResearchProjectDef.label: drug production
ResearchProjectDef.description: The basics of drug preparation and synthesis. Allows creation of the drug lab. Further research is required to make specific drugs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: electricity
ResearchProjectDef.description: Generate and use electricity for cooking and other simple tasks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: psychite refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to refine psychoid leaves into flake and yayo, different forms of the euphoric drug psychite.

ResearchProjectDef.label: wake-up production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Your chemists learn the formulas and techniques for synthesizing wake-up, a work performance-enhancing drug.

ResearchProjectDef.label: go-juice production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to produce the synthetic combat-performance-enhancing drug go-juice.

ResearchProjectDef.label: penoxycyline production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to produce penoxycline, a disease prevention drug.

ResearchProjectDef.label: batteries
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build batteries for storing electricity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build refineries to make chemfuel from wood.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nutrient paste
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build nutrient paste dispensers which efficiently produce edible meals from raw nutritive feedstocks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar panels
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build solar panels for electrical generation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: air conditioning
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build air conditions to cool rooms in the heat, or to keep freezers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: autodoors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build autodoors which open to permit movement without slowing anyone down.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build hydroponics basins to rapidly grow crops indoors regardless of the terrain or weather outside.

ResearchProjectDef.label: electric smelting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build electric smithy and smelters.\n\nThe electric smithy allows smithing items without fuel. The electric smelters uses heat and strong electromagnets to extract useful metal from slag chunks and other items.

ResearchProjectDef.label: electric cremation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build crematoriums which can vaporize unwanted corpses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: colored lights
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to construct colored lights for decorative purposes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: machining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build machining tables to craft guns and machinery or disassemble dead mechanoids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Explosive IEDs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build improvised explosive device-based traps from mortar shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Incendiary IEDs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build incendiary explosive traps from mortar shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mortars
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to build mortars which can lob shells long distances over walls.

ResearchProjectDef.label: microelectronics basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: The basics of working with delicate, complex electronics. This unlocks the high-tech research bench, comms console, and other research projects like tube televisions, and cryptosleep caskets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tube television
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the production of tube televisions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: gun turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the production of automated gun turrets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: firefoam
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of firefoam poppers; fire-safety buildings which spread fire-retardant foam in response to encroaching flames.

ResearchProjectDef.label: moisture pump
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of moisture pumps, which turn wet ground dry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: geothermal power
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build geothermal power plants on top of steam geysers, for uninterrupted power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hospital bed
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to construct hospital beds which increase chance of successful medical work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: transport pod
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct launchable transport pods that you can use to launch people and supplies long distances across the planet's surface.

ResearchProjectDef.label: medicine production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce medicine from herbal medicine, neutroamine, and cloth.

ResearchProjectDef.label: multi-analyzer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build multi-analyzers which increase research speed, and allow higher-level research projects, if placed near a research bench.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ground-penetrating scanner
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build ground-penetrating scanners that can detect drillable resources deep under the surface.

ResearchProjectDef.label: deep drilling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build deep drills for extracting resources from deep underground. You'll need a ground-penetrating scanner to find the resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: vitals monitor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build vitals monitors which increase patients treatment quality if placed next to medical beds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: component assembly
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build the Component Assembly Bench, where colonists can make components from simple materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: multibarrel weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build miniguns.

ResearchProjectDef.label: cryptosleep casket
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to construct cryptosleep caskets, which can put living beings in a state of suspended animation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: powered armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Neuro-memetic robotics and advanced plasteel weaving technologies allow you to build the power armor and power armor helmets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: charged shot
ResearchProjectDef.description: Understand the secrets of pulse-charged energy/projectile munitions. Allows you to build the charge rifle.

ResearchProjectDef.label: shipbuilding basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to start researching more advanced shipbuilding technologies and eventually build a ship to escape the planet.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ship cryptosleep caskets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to construct ship cryptosleep caskets for transporting cryptosleeping colonists between the stars.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ship antimatter reactor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to use an antimatter containment core to build a reactor to power a ship.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ship antimatter propulsion
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to construct an engine for a ship.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ship computer core
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows coercing an existing AI persona into a usable AI computer core for ship guidance.
